thread.title: James Comey testifies before House Intelligence Committee | New York Post
thread.title_full: James Comey testifies before House Intelligence Committee | New York Post

author: Post Staff Report
title: James Comey testifies before House Intelligence Committee | New York Post

organizations.name: house intelligence committee | new york post fbi

text:
FBI Director James Comey will testify before a House panel on Monday on President Trump’s unproven claims that President Obama “wire tapped” Trump Tower during last year’s election.
It will be Comey’s first public remarks since Trump made the claim two weeks ago.
The hearing will also feature testimony from National Security Director Adm. Mike Rogers on allegations that Russia meddled in the election.
